products.add: INSERT INTO products (price, num, specifications, notes) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
products.modify: UPDATE products SET price = ?, num = ?, specifications = ?, notes = ? WHERE id = ?;

users.add: INSERT INTO users (name, tel, address, notes) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
users.modify: UPDATE users SET name = ?, tel = ?, address = ?, notes = ? WHERE id = ?;
